attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are required to wear seat belts in cars and on buses now.we cant even stand in footballgrounds any more so how do all major rail companies get away with charging full price tickets for people who need to stand on trains. these trains travel in excess of 100 mph and on a recent experience from aberdeen to manchester the whole train was absolutely packed.it will take a few people to die before this government actually does any thing about it as always.
